bill_title: repeal certain sales tax exemptions relating to agricultural machinery parts, repairs, and maintenance.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to repeal certain sales tax exemptions relating to agricultural machinery parts, repairs, and maintenance. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-45-3.4 be repealed. 10-45-3.4. There are exempted from the provisions of this chapter and the tax imposed by it, gross receipts from the sale of the following: (1) Parts or repairs on machinery or equipment which are clearly identifiable as used primarily for agricultural purposes, including irrigation equipment, if the part replaces a farm machinery or irrigation equipment part assigned a specific or generic part number by the manufacturer of the farm machinery or irrigation equipment; and (2) Maintenance items and maintenance services used on machinery or equipment which are clearly identifiable as used primarily for agricultural purposes, including irrigation equipment. 135 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.075 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
